messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR ED VAIZEY
A STRONG LOCAL VOICE IN A NEW GOVERNMENT

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The NHS is Ed's top priority
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to fighting for our local NHS. GPs, community hospitals and district nurses are services which are vital to all of us.
Conservatives will get rid of top-down plans from Whitehall leading to houses being dumped on local areas. We will give people a say in how many, and where, local homes are needed.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Dealing with local problems for local people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ed is known for getting things done when people need help. 'The key to helping people with their problems is to respond quickly and take the right action.'

housing.content: Conservatives will give people a say in how many, and where, local homes are needed.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ed is known for getting things done when people need help.

politicalExperience.achievements: It's been a privilege to serve for five years as your MP.

images.caption: Ed Vaizey at various local sites and events

leaflet.additionalNotes: Ed was elected as MP for Wantage and Didcot in 2005.
